alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 3:46AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Saline County through 415 AM CDT... At 346 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookville, or 12 miles west of Salina, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, New Cambria, and Glendale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 92 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 236 and 263. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
